Member Function Documentation

int Login::comparePassword ( std::string  passToCompare)

takes in string containing password to check against. returns int containing result. 0 for failed. 1 for user. 3 for admin.

std::string Login::getAdmin ( )

takes no arguments. returns this objects admin status in string form.

std::string Login::getName ( )

takes no arguments. returns this objects username.
